external_references.description: Golo Muhr, Joshua Chung. (2025, May 15). Hive0154 targeting US, Philippines, Pakistan and Taiwan in suspected espionage campaign. Retrieved August 4, 2025.
Nick Dai, Vickie Su, Sunny Lu. (2022, November 18). Earth Preta Spear-Phishing Governments Worldwide. Retrieved August 4, 2025.

objects.description: [TONESHELL](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1239) has encoded a payload with a random 32-byte key using XOR.(Citation: 2022 November_TrendMicro_Earth Preta_Toneshell_Pubload) [TONESHELL](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1239) has also encoded payloads with a 256-byte key using XOR.(Citation: 2025_IBM_PUBLOAD_TONESHELL_HIUPAN_CLAIMLOADER_MUSTANG PANDA)
